business.headline: Sensex, Nifty swing between gains and losses in volatile session; IT stocks downThe S&P BSE Sensex, which was up nearly 300 points in early trade, fell 91.43 points to trade at 74,010.37 around 9:30 am. The Nifty50 also fell 40.60 points to trade at 22,457.30.

Jio signs deal with Elon Musk's SpaceX to bring Starlink internet to IndiaThe partnership aims to expand broadband access across India, especially in remote areas. Jio, which handles more mobile data than any other operator, will use Starlink's satellite network to strengthen its internet services.

Stock market today: Will Trump's latest tariff threat impact Dalal Street today? Stock market opening today: While domestic stocks remain under pressure, experts suggested that Dalal Street is unlikely to feel the impact of the ongoing weakness in US stock markets.

US stock markets remain under pressure after Monday's big crash. 3 things to knowThe S&P 500 dropped as low as 5,528.41, marking a 10% fall from its February 19 record of 6,144.15—hitting what traders call a "market correction."

Wall Street sinks amid Trump's tariff hike on Canadian metalsThe US stock market tumbled further after Trump doubled tariffs on Canadian steel and aluminum, with the Dow plunging 554 points amid rising economic uncertainty and fears of a prolonged trade war.

US stock market: Wall Street indices remain under pressure amid slowdown fearsAt the opening bell, the Dow Jones Industrial Average dropped 73.8 points, or 0.18%, to 41,837.95. The S&P 500 lost 10.9 points, or 0.19%, to 5,603.65, while the Nasdaq Composite was the only major index that recovered slightly in early trade.

Donald Trump to meet CEOs of America's biggest firms after Wall Street crashPresident Donald Trump is expected to speak with around 100 CEOs at a regular meeting of the Business Roundtable in Washington, an influential group of CEOs leading major US companies from Apple to JPMorgan Chase and Walmart.

Looking for fixed deposit with up to 9% interest? Check these small finance banksUnity Small Finance Bank offers 9% per annum for a 1001-day fixed deposit and 7.85% per annum for a one-year fixed deposit.

Why did Elon Musk's wealth shrink by $29 billion in a single day? Tesla's struggles have had a major impact on Musk's financial losses. In the past two months, Tesla's stock has fallen by 35%,wiping out $400 billion in market value.
Airtel signs deal with Elon Musk's SpaceX to bring Starlink internet to IndiaThe deal depends on SpaceX getting approval from authorities to sell Starlink services in India.
Sensex ends marginally lower, Nifty in green; IndusInd Bank crashes 27%The S&P BSE Sensex lost 12.85 points to end at 74,102.32, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 37.60 points to close at 22,497.90.

UPI and RuPay merchant charges may return: What it means for youThe government is planning to introduce a tiered pricing system, where bigger businesses pay higher charges while small businesses pay reduced charges.

entertainment.headline: Exclusive: Louis Tomlinson on India debut, love for Indian food, and solo career Louis Tomlinson, former One Direction member, embarked on his first solo performance in India at Lollapalooza 2025. He expressed excitement and a fondness for Indian culture, particularly its cuisine, during an exclusive interview.

Telugu actor-politician Posani Krishna Murali granted bail in all casesActor and YSRCP member Posani Krishna Murali has been granted bail in all cases. The YSRCP accused Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu-led government of filing 17 cases against him as part of a political vendetta.

SRK, Aishwarya Rai top contenders to replace Amitabh Bachchan on KBC: StudyAccording to a recent study conducted among fans, actors Shah Rukh Khan and Aishwarya Rai are the top picks to replace megastar Amitabh Bachchan on his game show Kaun Banega Crorepati.

TV star Disha Vakani was told not to scream during labour: Gayatri Mantra helpedDisha Vakani, famed for her role as Dayaben in TMKOC, opened up about her use of the Gayatri Mantra during the birth of her daughter, Stuti.

Louis Tomlinson on first India visit, solo career, Lollapalooza, love for Indian food | Exclusive Former One Direction member Louis Tomlinson finally arrives in India! In this exclusive chat with India Today's Bhavna Agarwal, he talks about his long-awaited visit, his excitement for Lollapalooza, and his deep love for Indian food (yes, he tried butter chicken!).

Daredevil Born Again breaks streaming records with 7.5 million views Latest Marvel series, Daredevil Born Again, has set a new streaming record with 7.5 million views in just five days. The series marks the return of Charlie Cox as Daredevil, alongside a mix of returning and new cast members.
American rock band Guns N' Roses to return to India after 12 years American rock band Guns N' Roses will return to India after 12 years. They will perform in Mumbai on May 17.

Kim Soo-hyun denies 'baseless' relationship claims with late actor Kim Sae-ronActor Kim Soo-hyun and his agency Gold Medalist have rejected allegations made by the YouTube channel Garosero Research Institute. The accusations suggest a past relationship with the late Kim Sae-ron and blame the agency for her financial woes.

KKK 14's Aditi Sharma heads for divorce, husband alleges infidelity in 4 monthsTV actor Aditi Sharma's marital bliss was short-lived as her husband Abhineet Kaushik accused her of cheating. This comes just four months after their secret wedding on November 12, 2024.

Mallika Sherawat in talks for Khatron Ke Khiladi 15: ReportMallika Sherawat is reportedly in talks for Khatron Ke Khiladi 15. While her participation isn't confirmed, she recently returned to Bollywood and is now looking for her next big project.

Singer Isabel LaRosa on performing at Lolla India: The experience was surrealIsabel LaRosa, known for hits like Favourite and I'm Yours, recently performed at Lollapalooza India. She discussed her music-making process and experience with India Today Digital.

Dhanashree Verma restores photos with Yuzvendra Chahal amid rumours of divorceDhanashree Verma restored Instagram photos with Yuzvendra Chahal amid divorce rumours. While her lawyer confirmed court proceedings, her family denied claims of a Rs 60 crore alimony demand.

general news.headline: Pakistan train hijack: Rescue ops on for over 200 hostages, 104 freed so far Live UpdatesThe Baloch Liberation Army, a separatist militant group, has claimed responsibility for hijacking the Jaffar Express. The militants claim to hold about 200 hostages, but authorities have yet to confirm this figure.

Ukraine ready for ceasefire with Russia, hope Putin will agree too: TrumpTrump's reaction came after Kyiv said it was ready to accept a 30-day ceasefire with Moscow, following talks with US representatives in Saudi Arabia's Jeddah on Tuesday.

Jio, which handles more mobile data than any other operator, will use Starlink's satellite network to strengthen its internet services.

Trump keeps his promise, buys Tesla, models for fleet outside White HouseAt the press conference on Tuesday, five vehicles were on display at the White Hoouse's South Law, with Donald Trump selecting a red Model S sedan to show his support to Elon Musk as he faces backlash over his efforts to downsize the federal government.

Will the surge in divorces and single living reshape Indian society?The meaning of relationships, marriage, and children is now up for debate. But do you think these changes could have an impact, whether positive or negative, on society?

CBI probes Ranya Rao's wedding footage, guest list, gifts for smuggling linksCBI officials conducted searches at Kannada actor Ranya Rao's residence, KIADB office, and wedding venue as they probed for links to gold smuggling. Water fasting lasts up to 24 to 72 hours: What happens beyond it? Water fasting is a method of fasting in which a person only drinks water for a stipulated time without any food intake. But most experts recommend adopting this diet for one to 3 days.

PM speaks Bhojpuri in Mauritius, says makhana on world menu soon"Everyone is talking about Bihar's Makhana. That day is not far away when Makhana will be part of the world menu," said PM Modi, as the crowd erupted in thunderous applause at Port Louis.

iPhone 16e review: Apple Intelligence and Visual Intelligence for the winThe iPhone 16e is Apple's cheapest phone right now, but it's definitely not cheap. However, with the upcoming Apple Intelligence and Visual Intelligence support, it seems like a great entry point into the ecosystem.
US to lift pause on intel sharing with Ukraine, resume security assistanceUkraine, meanwhile, has agreed to accept an immediate 30-day ceasefire in the war with Russia, a Reuters report said.

Not comfortable: Kareena to Gillian Anderson on avoiding sexual scenes in filmsIn an interview with actor Gillian Anderson, Kareena Kapoor Khan talked about not being comfortable doing a sexual scene on-screen. She shared the importance of understanding the essence of such scenes and treating them like a 'human experience'.

Lilavati hospital ex-trustees accused of siphoning Rs 1,250 crore, 3 cases filedThe current trustees of Lilavati Hospital conducted a forensic audit of accounts and uncovered significant financial irregularities, including the embezzlement of Rs 1,250 crore through fake orders and records.

Nigam shared a cryptic post, hitting out at the awards and sarcastically commenting on how they had to answer to the Rajasthan bureaucracy.

Ajit Pawar's budget tightrope, a move to counter Eknath Shinde's popularity?With Maharashtra battling mounting debt and a widening fiscal deficit, Finance Minister Ajit Pawar's budget blueprint emphasises financial discipline over populist spending.

3 arrested in Manipur for posing as Amit Shah's son, duping MLAs with fake offersThe police have invoked Sections 318(4) for cheating and fraud, and 319(2) for impersonation of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita in their investigation into the fraud case.

Manchester United announce plan to build new 100,000-seater stadiumManchester United have announced plans to build a new 100,000-seater stadium next to the existing Old Trafford on Tuesday, March 11. The new stadium will be the centrepiece of the Old Trafford regeneration project by United.

Kush Maini becomes 1st Indian in F1 since 2012, joins Alpine as reserve driverKush Maini became the third Indian driver to be a part of F1 as he joined the Alpine team as a reserve driver. Maini will continue to act as a test driver for the team as well, with a view to making it to the main grid in 2026.

Here's why we think he didn'tChampions Trophy 2025: A video of Rohit Sharma leaving the post-final press conference without taking the Champions Trophy has gone viral. NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.
